property.name: history.rootdir
property.description: This is the root history directory to monitor, and its sub directories should be organized as 2012/10/15/

property.name: history.catchup.dir
property.description: This is the directory to run catchup in.

property.name: history.access.catchup.ts
property.description: If this is set, the accessUpdater will run in catchup mode, and this value is the UNIX timestamp of which that day is used to catchup.
